passives.name: Support Quest
passives.effects: Earn 800 through Shared Riches to automatically upgrade to {{ii|Bounty of Worlds}}, increasing the Ward active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

passives.name: Shared Riches
passives.effects:
Grants a Shared Riches charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within icononly=true 1050 units of you, consume a charge in the following ways:
• Kill a minion by any means, granting you 20 and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. Damaging a minion below {{rd|50%|30%}} of its maximum health executes it.
• Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, granting you 24. A charge may be consumed this way only once per attack or ability.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area. Warding charges refill upon visiting the shop.
